summary: AN ORDINANCE approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6743 for the improvement of the alley in Block 13, plat of central Seattle (commonly known as McKinney's plat of Central Seattle), being the alley between 13th Avenue South and 14th Avenue South from South Walker Street to South Hill Street, by paving, etc., and levying and assessing the amounts thereof upon the property within the district; and establishing a local improvement fund.
